name: Awakening of Vitu-Ghazi
oracle_text: Put nine +1/+1 counters on target land you control. It becomes a legendary 0/0 Elemental creature with haste named Vitu-Ghazi. It's still a land.

name: Band Together
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures you control each deal damage equal to their power to another target creature.

name: Battlefield Promotion
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains first strike until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

name: Blindblast
oracle_text:
Blindblast deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card.

name: Bolt Bend
oracle_text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.
Change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

name: Chandra's Pyrohelix
oracle_text: Chandra's Pyrohelix deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.

name: Chandra's Triumph
oracle_text: Chandra's Triumph deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls. Chandra's Triumph deals 5 damage to that permanent instead if you control a Chandra planeswalker.

name: Commence the Endgame
oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Draw two cards, then amass X, where X is the number of cards in your hand. (Put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

name: Crush Dissent
oracle_text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
Amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

name: Deathsprout
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

name: Defiant Strike
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.

name: Despark
oracle_text: Exile target permanent with converted mana cost 4 or greater.

name: Desperate Lunge
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

name: Divine Arrow
oracle_text: Divine Arrow deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

name: Dovin's Veto
oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Counter target noncreature spell.

name: Forced Landing
oracle_text: Put target creature with flying on the bottom of its owner's library.

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Gideon's Sacrifice
oracle_text: Choose a creature or planeswalker you control. All damage that would be dealt this turn to you and permanents you control is dealt to the chosen permanent instead (if it's still on the battlefield).

name: Gideon's Triumph
oracle_text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature that attacked or blocked this turn. If you control a Gideon planeswalker, that player sacrifices two of those creatures instead.

name: Heartfire
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or planeswalker.
Heartfire deals 4 damage to any target.

name: Heartwarming Redemption
oracle_text: Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards plus one. You gain life equal to the number of cards in your hand.

name: Ignite the Beacon
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two planeswalker cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Jaya's Greeting
oracle_text: Jaya's Greeting deals 3 damage to target creature. Scry 1.

name: Lazotep Plating
oracle_text:
Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
You and permanents you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (You and they can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

name: Liliana's Triumph
oracle_text: Each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a Liliana planeswalker, each opponent also discards a card.

name: Nahiri's Stoneblades
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+0 until end of turn.

name: Narset's Reversal
oracle_text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell, then return it to its owner's hand. You may choose new targets for the copy.

name: No Escape
oracle_text:
Counter target creature or planeswalker spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
Scry 1.

name: Ob Nixilis's Cruelty
oracle_text: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

name: Pledge of Unity
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. You gain 1 life for each creature you control.

name: Rally of Wings
oracle_text: Untap all creatures you control. Creatures you control with flying get +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Ral's Outburst
oracle_text: Ral's Outburst deals 3 damage to any target. Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

name: Return to Nature
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target card from a graveyard.

name: Samut's Sprint
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1.

name: Sarkhan's Catharsis
oracle_text: Sarkhan's Catharsis deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

name: Sorin's Thirst
oracle_text: Sorin's Thirst deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

name: Steady Aim
oracle_text: Untap target creature. It gets +1/+4 and gains reach until end of turn.

name: Teferi's Time Twist
oracle_text: Exile target permanent you control. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. If it enters the battlefield as a creature, it enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Topple the Statue
oracle_text:
Tap target permanent. If it's an artifact, destroy it.
Draw a card.

name: Totally Lost
oracle_text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.

name: Tyrant's Scorn
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less.
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.

name: Unlikely Aid
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
